verses.translation: Woe to those that deal in fraud,-

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكْتَالُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ
verses.translation: Those who, when they have to receive by measure from men, exact full measure,
But when they have to give by measure or weight to men, give less than due.
Do they not think that they will be called to account?-
On a Mighty Day,
A Day when (all) mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds?

verses.arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَـٰبَ ٱلْفُجَّارِ لَفِى سِجِّينٍ
verses.translation: Nay! Surely the record of the wicked is (preserved) in Sijjin.
And what will explain to thee what Sijjin is?
(There is) a Register (fully) inscribed.
Woe, that Day, to those that deny-
Those that deny the Day of Judgment.

verses.arabic: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
verses.translation: And none can deny it but the Transgressor beyond bounds the Sinner!
verses.transliteration: Wama yukaththibu bihi illakullu muAAtadin atheem

verses.arabic: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ ءَايَـٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: When Our Signs are rehearsed to him, he says, "Tales of the ancients!"
verses.transliteration: Itha tutla AAalayhi ayatunaqala asateeru al-awwaleen

verses.arabic: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ ۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.translation: By no means! but on their hearts is the stain of the (ill) which they do!
verses.transliteration: Kalla bal rana AAalaquloobihim ma kanoo yaksiboon

verses.arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمْ عَن رَّبِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّمَحْجُوبُونَ
verses.translation: Verily, from (the Light of) their Lord, that Day, will they be veiled.
Further, they will enter the Fire of Hell.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: Further, it will be said to them: "This is the (reality) which ye rejected as false!
verses.transliteration: Thumma yuqalu hatha allatheekuntum bihi tukaththiboon

verses.arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَـٰبَ ٱلْأَبْرَارِ لَفِى عِلِّيِّينَ
verses.translation: Nay, verily the record of the Righteous is (preserved) in 'Illiyin.
And what will explain to thee what 'Illiyun is?
(There is) a Register (fully) inscribed,
To which bear witness those Nearest (to Allah).
Truly the Righteous will be in Bliss:
On Thrones (of Dignity) will they command a sight (of all things):
Thou wilt recognise in their faces the beaming brightness of Bliss.
Their thirst will be slaked with Pure Wine sealed:

verses.arabic: خِتَـٰمُهُۥ مِسْكٌ ۚ وَفِى ذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ ٱلْمُتَنَـٰفِسُونَ
verses.translation: The seal thereof will be Musk: And for this let those aspire, who have aspirations:
With it will be (given) a mixture of Tasnim:
A spring, from (the waters) whereof drink those Nearest to Allah.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا۟ كَانُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.translation: Those in sin used to laugh at those who believed,
verses.transliteration: Inna allatheena ajramoo kanoomina allatheena amanoo yadhakoon

verses.translation: And whenever they passed by them, used to wink at each other (in mockery);

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُوا۟ فَكِهِينَ
verses.translation: And when they returned to their own people, they would return jesting;

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ
verses.translation: And whenever they saw them, they would say, "Behold! These are the people truly astray!"
But they had not been sent as keepers over them!

verses.arabic: فَٱلْيَوْمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.translation: But on this Day the Believers will laugh at the Unbelievers:
On Thrones (of Dignity) they will command (a sight) (of all things).

verses.arabic: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ ٱلْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: Will not the Unbelievers have been paid back for what they did?
